title: SoftBank-backed Vir Biotechnology raises $143 million in U.S. IPO
text:
SoftBank-backed Vir Biotechnology raises $143 million in U.S. IPO

Technology 27 minutes ago (Oct 10, 2019 08:01PM ET)

© Reuters. SoftBank-backed Vir Biotechnology raises $143 million in U.S. IPO NEW YORK (Reuters) - Vir Biotechnology (O: ) priced its initial public offering (IPO) at $20 a share on Thursday, at the bottom end of expectations, a fresh blow for SoftBank Group Corp's (T: ) Vision Fund, owner of 21% in the infectious disease researcher. San Francisco-based Vir raised $142.9 million having previously set a price range of $20-$22 per share. The IPO valued Vir at $2.2 billion.

SoftBank-backed Vir Biotechnology raises $143 million in U.S. IPO
